addon.title: Colorbox YouTube
addon.description:
Installation instructions:
1. Replace the default youtube bbcode with this one. 2. Go to System Admin tab. 3. Click the BB Codes icon. 4. Find "Colorbox YouTube Flash Video Embedder" in the list. 5. Click Enable.
How to use: After you followed the "Installation instructions" go to any option that is using bbcodes and click the YouTube icon and you will get this tag: [ youtube ] [ /youtube ] Inside the tag add the YouTube ID, you will find it at the end of a YouTube video, Ex: youtube.com/watch?v=ID
Other Info: The difference from this version and the one from the pack is that this one won't let you use full links, you will need to use just the ID.
addon.author: Falcon

addon.title: Code "Select All"
addon.description:
following a request of an italian member i modified the wooya's code bbcode in order to add a "select all" tool
Notes: - Javascript come from phpBB3 forum functions and it was modified for PHP-Fusion - $locale['bb_code_select'] is set by default to "Select All" if not localized - There's a backup file called 'code_bbcode_include.php.backup' with the original Wooya's BBcode

addon.title: !AutoNoParse, NoParse
addon.description:
With these BBcodes you can prevent smiley and other bbcode parsing. !autonoparse will prevent parsing also between php, code, and geshi.
notes: In order to use "noparse" bbcode, you MUST enable "!autonoparse" - before ALL bbcodes.
enjoy!

addon.title: News Archive
addon.description: This is a side panel which will list all your news items by year and month from newest to oldest.
addon.author: Philip

addon.title: Social
addon.description: You can put your accounts at social sites :Facebook, Youtube, Twitter
addon.author: PHPar

addon.title: Puzzle Page
addon.description: Mini comic plugin that can brighten up the leisure user by collecting a random puzzle from your image galleries on the site.
addon.author: jikaka

addon.title: Fp tabs
addon.description: FP Tabs Panel is an JQuery and CSS Tabs Panel infusion for setting notices, info or messages on your site. Features : 1. Tabs designed using JQuery & Css 2. Allows up to 5 tabs 3. Option to enable or disable each tab 4. Tabs styles can be set in the FP Tabs Panel infusion Admin and it uses a nice jquery colour picker for easy styling. 5. Each tab can have its own name and content which can each be set in the FP 7. 6. Tabs Panel infusion admin. 7.Uses BB codes to parse tabs content
addon.author: Fangree_Craig

addon.title: Yahoo Weather Feed
addon.description: The panel of Yahoo! Weather forecast with automatic scrolling on jQuery.
addon.author: jikaka

addon.title: Site Content
addon.description: Panel showing number of: Articles , News, Photos, Private messages, Links, Downloads, Custom Pages, BB Coder, Comments, Shouts, Forum Threads, Forum Posts, Attached Files
addon.author: smokeman

addon.title: jQuery Translate
addon.description: This is an Ultimate jQuery Translate Panel which allows Users to Translate on the same page without going to Google Translate or reloading the Page
addon.author: Ankur Thakur

addon.title: Hayaletsevgili Online Users
addon.description: This panel show last 5 and more 5 users with avatar . Last seen minute,hours, days,weeks. Avatar's title is user's location and there are last seen date.
addon.author: HaYaLeT

addon.title: Simple News Scroller Side
addon.description: As the Name explains everything to you, this is a Side Panel which will Display Latest 5 news as a Down-Up Sliding News with showing News Subject, News Category link and the User who submitted the News. The Live Demo will be visible on the Left Side of the page of Link.
addon.author: Ankur Thakur

addon.title: Double Articles
addon.description:
Double Articles Panel is a panel where you can see some info about Articles.
FEATURES SHOWING:
5 Random Articles. 5 Most popular Articles.
Info about how many times each Article for it self had being read. Info about how many times all Articles had being read. Info about how many Articles there is in the database.
addon.author: smokeman

addon.title: Feedback
addon.description: Quick connection with the administration of the site using a modal window on JQuery.
addon.author: jikaka

addon.title: Graphical Counter
addon.description: Graphical Counter Panel shows number of unique visitors in a side-panel with images/icons - instead of the ordinary text-figures.
addon.author: smokeman

addon.title: CSS/JavaScript Dropdown Menu
addon.description:
A fancy horizontal Dropdown Menu for your PHP-Fusion site.
Insertion of links from the infusions administration-part. - No need to edit codes.
Will work with all standard-coded themes - without any modding at all.
addon.author: smokeman

addon.title: Top 5 Forum Posters Centre
addon.description: A centre panel to show the Top 5 Forum Posters. Displays top 5 forum posters with username, avatar and post count. Does not include admins.
addon.author: Fangree_Craig

addon.title: Submissions Panel
addon.description: The panel, which displays the new arrivals from users: - News - Articles - Links - Photos. The panel is visible only to the administrator. Very useful for sites that offer content from its users.
addon.author: jikaka

addon.title: Christmas
addon.description:
Christmas Panel ideal for the festive season.
Features Falling Snow on your site Advent Countdown Displays a different Christmas icon every day from 1 December until 25th December. Option to enable or disable each tab Christmas Countdown Script Uses google Webfonts for nice text 2 in 1 panel allows it to be used as a Centre or Side Panel without modifications
Changelog: v 1.00: First public release v 1.01: Fixed Countdown.php Advent now works we removed 0 from in front of dates like 01 02 03 04 05 06 07 08 09 is now 123456789 v 1.02: Updated for PHP-Fusion v7.02 compatibility, Added Google Webfont for displaying nice text.
addon.author: Fangree_Craig

addon.title: Donate Panel
addon.description:
This small but handy infusion & panel, You can start taking donations on your site via paypal. This download comes with a nice donations side panel, a donate page and Admin back end where you can configure the Paypal Donate Page description, Side Panel description, Site donate page description and add your Paypal Email account.
Other Credits: Special Thanks to Barspin for Assisting with admin and infusion.php Thanks to Paypal API. Testing by Nostradamus
addon.author: Fangree_Craig

addon.title: Ji&Ha Gallery
addon.description: An alternative to the standard photogallery to view photos through the slide show.
addon.author: jikaka, HaYaLeT

addon.title: Random Sum
addon.description: Simple mathematical game on jQuery which allows to develop self-concentration and attention in a combination to practice on summation of simple numbers.
addon.author: jikaka

addon.title: NewSlider
addon.description: This is the official theme of the site PHP-Fusion CMS support in Brazil and in Countries That speak the Portuguese language. This theme uses the technique of multi-color background (jquery framework). It also has a beautiful and functional slider called Nivo Slider. The theme is valid within the international standards by the W3C.
addon.author: Halisson Ricardo

addon.title: Spam Report
addon.description: This is a small left side panel with a button members can click to report Spam on a particular page. Once reported, no one else can report that page. Admins are notified of a spam report in the panel with a link to a page that displays the reported page, who reported it and the date. Once the Spam has been dealt with, the report can be deleted and the button will reset for that page.
addon.author: HobbyMan

addon.title: FP Forum Info
addon.description: FP Forum Info panel displays a stylish CSS Notice box above forum threads for normal threads (Green), sticky threads (Blue) and locked threads (red). If a thread is sticky and locked it will display a yellow box. Also shows if attachments are in the thread, thread author name, posts in thread count, thread views and thread id.
addon.author: Fangree Craig

addon.title: HappyAccidents
addon.description: A simple, yet some and clean looking theme.
addon.author: KEFF, SoulSmasher

addon.title: Bifrost
addon.description: The official PHP-Fusion default theme.
addon.author: Johan Wilson

addon.title: Reflux
addon.description: Light gray and white theme based of Modern10.
addon.author: Structor

addon.title: The Movie House
addon.description: Theme based on movies, but is also changeble for other purposes.
addon.author: Tommy Hermans

addon.title: Arise
addon.description: The official PHP-Fusion default theme.
addon.author: Domi

addon.title: Ajax user info
addon.description: Modification of the standard user panel on Ajax. When the mouse cursor move on the avatar your name, IP-address and how many unread messages are showed.
addon.author: klimiux

addon.title: Enhanced Online Users
addon.description: Extended central panel "Who on this site."
addon.author: Fangree Craig

addon.title: Comments Management
addon.description: This infusion allow you to manage comments directly from the control panel without going to pages where they were added.
addon.author: khalid545

addon.title: Blue Radius
addon.description: Theme in bright colors with blue.
addon.author: Fangree Craig

addon.title: Pumpkin
addon.description: Another animated template in Halloween style.
addon.author: Mangee

addon.title: Fashion
addon.description: Fashion style.
addon.author: www.templates.com

addon.title: Filmumanija
addon.description: Bright theme for sites about movies and animation.
addon.author: mAnaXi

addon.title: GRP Four
addon.description: The dark theme in the Grand Theft Auto style.
addon.author: ViliusR

addon.title: JPA FM
addon.description: The best radio theme.
addon.author: E-Studija

addon.title: RuneMarket
addon.description: Theme in fantasy style for the gaming site.
addon.author: Visos

addon.title: Colorus
addon.description: Dark theme with colorful aero waves.
addon.author: Joar

addon.title: Asperon
addon.description: A dark blue theme.
addon.author: Nick Jones

addon.title: Photowidget
addon.description: Adds a panel which will show randomize images in a cloud of photo thumbs from your PHP-Fusion gallery.
addon.author: Domi

addon.title: User Control
addon.description: This is a powerful Administrators tool for the bulk banning or deletion of user accounts. It will display up to 100 users per page depending on access level and setting chosen giving an Admin with Ban privileges the ability to ban or delete multiple selection of user accounts. With built in Spam Rate, it give a site admin a quick glance at the member accounts and any content all in one place.
addon.author: Philip

addon.title: Multicolor Theme
addon.description: Free multicolor theme with color switcher.
addon.author: faga
